meanings.definition: the quality or state of being lecherous
meanings.sent1: His lecherousnesses were evident in the way he constantly made inappropriate comments.
meanings.sent2: The town gossips loved to discuss the lecherousnesses of the local politician.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lecherousnesses, he always managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The lecherousnesses of the old mansion seemed to seep into every corner, giving it a sinister air.
meanings.sent5: The lecherousnesses of the villain in the story made him a truly despicable character.
